document_data.name: Arrowsar Apartments
document_data.mainbody: The '''Arrowsar Appartments''' was a rather ornate, rental complex in the city of [[Waterdeep]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: This building was located along [[Snail Street]], in the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] of Waterdeep.
document_data.History: The Arrowsar Apartments were constructed sometime after [[1367 DR]], atop the site once occupied by the [[Heartflame]] festhall, following the latter being burnt to the ground on the [[Night of Pirates]].
